definition: to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together

sentences.english: After ten years of careful preparations, he attacked and finally conquered the State of Wu.
sentences.chinese: 經過十年艱苦奮鬥，越過終於雪恥戰勝吳國。

sentences.english: We should carry through the principle of plain living and hard struggle.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥的精神要貫徹始終。

sentences.english: Hard work is rewarding And three years later, we me again.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥是值得的，三年後我們又相遇了。

sentences.english: The spirit of arduous struggle is a social-historical category.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥精神是一個社會歷史範疇。

sentences.english: We will strongly advocate hard work and plain living and firmly oppose extravagance and waste.
sentences.chinese: 大力提倡艱苦奮鬥，堅決制止奢侈浪費。

sentences.english: They should do things simply and economically, practising economy and working hard with perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 要提倡因陋就簡，經濟節約，艱苦奮鬥。

sentences.english: Hard  graft is the only way to succeed in business.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥是在事業上成功的唯一途徑。

sentences.english: They must also take the lead in working hard and living simply.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥，也要高級幹部帶頭。

sentences.english: We in China are proud of our achievements accomplished through strenuous efforts.
sentences.chinese: 中國對自己通過艱苦奮鬥而取得的成就感到自豪。

sentences.english: Live plainly, struggle hard, do not wallow in luxuries and pleasures.
sentences.chinese: 以艱苦奮鬥爲榮，以嬌奢淫逸爲恥。

sentences.english: Hard work and discipline could lead to self-improvement.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥和嚴守紀律是改善自我的途徑。

sentences.english: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.chinese: 在不損害他人利益的前提下爲成功艱苦奮鬥。

sentences.english: Strive hardy for success without impairing other's benefit.
sentences.chinese: 在不損害他人利益的前提下爲成功艱苦奮鬥。

sentences.english: Working hard and frugal are both virtues.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦奮鬥和勤儉節約均是美德。

sentences.english: " I "work hard, " 3 minutes and 6 issue still empty 3.
sentences.chinese: 我又“艱苦奮鬥”了3分鐘，六道題還空着三個。

sentences.english: We must continue to develop the revolutionary tradition of thrift and hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我們應繼續發揚艱苦奮鬥的革命傳統。

definition: to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
one step, one footprint (idiom); steady progress/reliable
pinyin: yi1 bu4 yi1 ge4 jiao3 yin4

definition: the hardships of beginning an undertaking (idiom)
to follow through/to carry through to the end
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
to bear hardships and work hard (idiom); assiduous and long-suffering/hard-working and capable of overcoming adversity
to exhaust one's thoughts and ingenuity (idiom); to think sth through thoroughly/to rack one's brains/to leave no stone unturned
to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
to advance dauntlessly in wave upon wave (idiom)
